questions.question: Find the arc length of the curve y = ln(cos(x)), from x = 0 to x = π/4.
Suppose f is a function defined and continuous for all x. If the integral from a to b of f(x) dx = 0 for every choice of a and b, what must be true about f?
options: The integral from 0 to x of f(t) dt is a constant for all x
f has no maxima or minima

questions.question: What is the radius of convergence of the power series ∑ (from n=0 to ∞) ((2^n*x^n) / (n!))?
The line tangent to the curve y = f(x) = x^3 at the point (1,1) intersects the x-axis at what point?
Calculate the surface area of a solid obtained by revolving the curve y = x^2, 0 ≤ x ≤ 1 about the x-axis.
The integral from -∞ to ∞ of e^(-x^2) dx is equal to:
What type of pollution results from excessive light produced by human activities at night that interferes with wildlife?
What type of pollution is produced by loud sounds in the environment such as construction or heavy traffic?
Which of the following materials, when improperly disposed of, can contribute to soil pollution?
Which pollutant, when released into the atmosphere, can contribute to the depletion of the ozone layer?
